knimeNode.name: Generic Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generic loop start node with no termination criterion.

fullDescription.intro: In combination with a "Variable Condition Loop (End)" node, you can build a loop while body is executed until a certain condition on one of the flow variables is met. The condition must be set in the loop's end node.
fullDescription.link: KNIME E-Learning Course: Section 7.2. Re-executing Workflow Parts: Loops
